title: You Can't Hide A Beautiful Body
itunes:title: You Can't Hide A Beautiful Body
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I am a 30 year old single woman without any children and I am dating a 41 year old man that has 3 young daughters. We’ve been together for 5 months and all of a sudden, he does not approve of how I dress. He told me that I dress as if I want attention from other men and not like a wholesome woman.  I am a full-time legal assistant at a popular law firm and I take law classes at night..............

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
